documents.document:
Life can be borin as MY life carries on...................

yea it can b borin..................Until.................i hv frens round me n in da internet.............. BTW i enjoy makin frens!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

TEST is over!

i can breathe!!!!!!!!!!i luv da fresh air!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!hate test n studyin alot..............i tink i finish english in 5/10 mins!!!!!!!!!!!cheh wr

i luv skul?

hmmmmmmmmmmmmm sumtimez i luv skul n stupi borin homework!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!i lyk 2 hug all of my frens even when i come 2 skul,test/exam n goin bck time.Yesterday joshua call me jungle gurl!!!!!!!!juz cuz i waz active!i damn pissed off!!!!!!!!!!n dil started fightin wif tsu n she keepaskin me 2 bck off!!!!!!!!!!nxt time i'll sk her 2 bck off!!!!!!!!!!! n in class,Ruth wz lyk sayin hi 2 techer in a.........way.we all tot she's flirtin n i will not continue.i got my mths mark n i almost cried!!!!!!!!!!78,78!!!!!!!!!!!!!i HATE IT!!!!!!!!!!!eline got a b 2 so we juz moan roun n roun.............in moral class every body tot kong died n i ask ying 2 wake him up by k
issin him!so she went cuz every 1 said she's d only way but blurfce didn't wake up.Any way enuf bout dat, i summore got 92 4 morl n i strted gettin angry,n said y can't my maths mark b lyk my moral mark!!!!!!!!!nyway i'm goin 2 fail science!!!!!!!!!!gud luck failin!!!!!!!!!!!!!1

.................skul is................

Skul waz kinda horrible!my frenz n i had 2 do kawad n da gurl (i cannot say da name)waz bossin us round!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!she even sk ying whether she wanna stay /leave!when steffi came bck cuz she went sum where,dat gurl scolded her!!!!!!!!!!!she's soooooooooooooo bossy! she's tryin 2 find fault wif me! but it all ended when ying n steffi n stefanie sed dey wanna leave!dat solved everything!den i waz stuck wif coral speaking!sooooooooooooooo many things 2 do!!!!!!!!!!!!n ying went 2 kal's hse!!!!!!!!!!!!111no fair!my dad waz soooooooooo annoyin!

da othr dy me n my frenz were in da sc lab,when my stupid monitor ask if i wanna join chess!plus my fren 2!!!!!!!!!!!!!he waz lyk forcin us!!!!!!!!!!!!!lyk never force b4 ah! n i hope elaine nv lyk him!!!!!!!!!!soooooooooo ft chance!!!!!!!!!!!!suckin ass! hah!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! but i'm stilll n @ da same time i created da joke!KAL SHOWED US SENTANCE IN A LEGACY BOOK n it sed i hope u choke on a condom!

n den i sed izzit a condominium?n every1 started laughin!!!!!!!!!!!!!n kal repeated da joke lyk i dunno how many times!!!!1 more thing if ur readin on my blog,plz comment!thx luv ya!!!!!!!!!!!!

busssssssssssssy week

i hd 2 wake up early n go 2 skul 4 da whole week!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! but i lyk it! n i coudn't go2dy............... i miss out sooooooooo much fun all d time!!!!!!!!!!!yesterday andrew purposelyst nxt 2 ying n i cuz he wanted 2 b close 2 elaine!!!n den in choral speaking,cuz we were so borin we had 2 stand wif knees bent!anw i juz hope i get gud luck 4 chorl speaking n kawd competition! peace out!

ook...........i wonder..............

i had da kawad competition n dere were 4 teams n we got last.......but we lyk v.semangat,we act lyk we won a prize!!singin in da bus,food fight (den b came water fight in skul)xd......... in d guys 1 oni had 2 teams conpeting(not fair!!!!)n kepong won!no offence but 2 those in kepong i juz kept quiet bout dis!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! hmmmmmmmmmmm,i heard dat my fwen's mom ask her 2 quit st john!dtz so damn strict!i hope my d's in gud mood so i can go 2 klcc 2moro!but now my rents's r oso so dmn strict!!!!!!!!!dey hv da rite 2 remain silent!!!!!!

i'm goin awayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy 2 USA!!!!!!!

I'M GOIN 2 US!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i'm goin 2 LA 2!!!!!!!!i really hope i can meet lotsa celebrities dere!!!!!!!!!!!but..............i'm missin out da stjohn camp.......n i heard dat itz gonn b fun......wahhhhhhhhhh no fair..........dere even hvin a disco on da last nite!!!!!!!!!!i'm so damm freakin jealous.........itz gonna b so fun!!!!!!!!!in class 2dy.......teacher vidthiyaa is goin away!!!!!!!!!!!!anthr thing 2 my sad dy.......... lotsa ppl heard dat *** couple wif ***** n dey broke up n couple n broke up n couple n da rest of da whole story....

is life dat difficult?????????????!!!!!!!!!

sighhhhhhhhhh,i dun feel wanted i juz dun when i come bck,itz lyk every1 wans me 2 go away...............da world dosen't need me...i'm 1000% sure.....plus my fren dosen't listen 2 me itz lyk da worst week eva!!!!!!!!!commiting suicide isn such bad idea................... andrew's such f*cker cuz he juz wans 2 get wat he wans i heard he write my name in da demerit book/watevr cuz i din do my duty..........i feel lyk steppin on him!!!!!!!!!!!!!besides i dun cre!!!!!!!!!!!!i'm not gonna get cuz i nv get!!!!!!!!!!!!!

watz wrong wif me??????????

i'm always bored,i'm alwys emo/moody ,WTZ WRONG WIF ME!!!!!!!!!!my fren dun wn 2 talk 2 me n i'm always left out...... my fren htez me....................................................................i feel lyk cryin...how do u tink i'm gonn get dis stright! i hte myself 4 losing out lyk dis peace out!

lyk life cant get worse......................

i've gone from hyper gurl 2 emo freak!!!!! ,i can even cry in class,must b part of bein dis age, ,i failed stupid sejarah n pjk,dammit punished so hardd, n when i wanted 2 try out 4 choral,my rents' screamed @ ME !!!!!!!!!n i hv 2 work extra hard,n i dun even noe whether i got in,anyway life cant get worse cuz im depressed enuf ,tc peace out!!!!!!!!
